result.execSummary:
The defendant Lane K Larson was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).
  • Disorderly Conduct, a class B misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 947.01(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Lane K Larson

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Loss of good time 5 days, due to jail violation.

Defendant Lane K Larson in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Christine M. Genda appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Rights/Elements.  Defendant pled no contest to Cts. 1 & 2.  Court found guilty.  Judgment was entered.  Court sentenced defendant on Ct. 1 to serve 45 days in jail.  $443.00 costs.  On Ct. 2 Court sentenced defendant to serve 45 day jail, consecutive to Ct. 1.  $243.00 costs.  60 days to pay or set up a payment plan with Clerk of Courts.  Jail start on 9-30-15 7:00 pm.  1 day jail credit.  Defendant may transfer to Sauk County.  Must submit DNA sample.
For Leave to File Additional Motions filed by  ADA Troy Cross
and Notice of DNA and Witness List filed by  ADA Troy Cross
Discovery letter filed by  ADA Troy Cross

Defendant Lane K Larson in court with attorney Mark D. Lawton.  Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin.   Reset requested.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for August 31, 2015 at 03:30 pm.  Return date scheduled for September 17, 2015 at 02:45 pm.

not initiate any contact w/Officer C. Dorner, Wisconsin Dells P.D., not be on premises of Showboat Saloon and Momma's Garage in Wisconsin Dells, not be in possession of any controlled substances or drug paraphernalia w/out valid prescription, absolute sobriety

Defendant, Lane K Larson, appeared. Jane E. Kohlwey appeared for the State of Wisconsin. $200.00 sign bond, not initiate any contact w/Officer C. Dorner, Wisconsin Dells P.D., not be on premises of Showboat Saloon and Momma's Garage in Wis Dells, not be in possession of any controlled substances or drug paraphernalia w/out valid prescription, absolute sobriety, posted bond to be returned,  Pre-trial conference scheduled for June 22, 2015 at 04:00 pm.  Return date scheduled for July 24, 2015 at 02:45 pm.
